评论详情: I love this necklace. Very cute and and looks exactly like the picture. Durable and can elevate your look. Great price and nice size.
This is honestly so cute!!! Price point is perfect. It was a gift for my 8 year old she loves it. I love it too. I wear it as well.

The necklace is very very cute. I gave it to my daughter for her 9th birthday party. The necklace can essentially match with any outfit because it has multiple colors! She has also gotten lots of compliments on it as well.
Used it for Halloween costume! Super cute!
Super cute for the price! The beads and colors vary from the picture but they are still very similar to what’s shown. Love that it’s not too tight and can be adjusted!
Since there weren’t any reviews I was a little skeptical but it turned out SO GOOD and well made!! Definitely recommend :)
Small choker size, needed to add some links  to extension chain. Otherwise is great. Bright colors.
This necklace is very very tiny.  It is NOT for women, but will look darling on a toddler, providing she has a thin neck.  It is very short.
If your y2k, buy this. Unfortunately I got this during Christmas and it’s no longer my style. Very good quality tho!
